definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: In that day the Lord will snatch away their finery: the bangles and headbands and crescent necklaces
sentences.chinese: 到那日，主必除掉她们华美的脚钏，发网，月牙圈。

sentences.english: we have received the goods you send us, the quality is excellent.
sentences.chinese: 我们外贸服装批发网收到贵处来的货，质量很好。

sentences.english: In that day the Lord will take away the bravery of their tinkling ornaments about their feet, and their cauls, and their round tires like the moon
sentences.chinese: 到那日，主必除掉他们华美的脚钏，发网，月牙圈。

definition: to issue a card/(slang) to reject a guy or a girl/to chuck
Mawei district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
ponytail (hairstyle)/horse's tail/slender fibers like horse's tail (applies to various plants)
cape/shawl/(of long hair) to trail over one's shoulders
